amendment.description: An amendment numbered 3 printed in Part B of House Report 117-225 to extend automatic enrollment to Veterans who were discharged within 90 days before the enactment of this Act.
amendment.purpose: Amendment extends automatic enrollment to veterans who were discharged within 90 days before the enactment of this Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 198 (Roll no. 12).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A003) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A003) offered by Ms. Escobar.
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 198 (Roll no. 12).
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Escobar amendment (A003) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 228 - 198 (Roll no. 12).
